name: ARPB_TX_REF_INFO
description: This table stores additional information entered by users via the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RFND_ADDTL_INFO_FLD
columns.description: This column contains the titles for additional fields in which users may enter additional information in the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: RFND_ADDTL_INFO_VAL
columns.description: This column contains additional information entered by users in the Refund Request Slip form.
